title: Kadrin Font
content:
Hey Guys,

I just released my first experimental font called Kadrin.  
Any feedback would be amazing!  
 [Link to Kadrin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162938/http:/www.behance.net/gallery/Kadrin-Font/7493803)

Thanks alot,  
Kinda new here haha

Billy
author: billelis

comments.content:
Hi Billy,

Interesting work, but the D looks like a P, at first I read Kaprin instead of Kadrin.

Leo
